## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G27860](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G27860)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AXS1</u>
- **Gene Name:** UDP-D-apiose/UDP-D-xylose synthase 1
- **Description:**   UDP-D-apiose/UDP-D-xylose synthase 1;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2041974
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
